title: JSON Schema for GenshinCalc 'itemGroupDB' object.
description: Item Groups Database. Various properties will be applied to the individual items in each group.

title.description: Used as a replacement name when displaying the name.

priority.description: The 'priority' the item groups will be sorted into within the same item-sort type.

icon.description:
String: What Icon should be shown when item converting is enabled.
Bool: "true" to use the group name.
The image must exist in /images/itemGroups/ as a PNG (spaces get converted to underscores). "convertType" must be set.

iconUseSubgroups.description: Bool for grouping each item within the group as an icon instead of the main group. Appends a number (starting at 0) to the file name. Icon must be a string.

items.description: The list of (unique) items within the group. An item can only be part of a single group. Items should be listed in ascending rarity.

source.description: Where you can get the item(s). This shows up in a tooltip if set.

craftUp.description: A boolean if the items within the group can be crafted into the next one. Default true.

canConvertTo.description: A boolean if the items within the group can be converted between same-rarity items of the same item kind. i.e. "Varunada Lazurite Sliver" can be converted to "Agnidus Agate Sliver". Default true.

convertTo.description: The kinds of items the group can be converted to. Must be used with "convertType" set to "inter".

convertType.description: How conversion works with items in the group. "inter" being cross-groups and "intra" being only within the group. Setting this to "intra" does not disable crafting up into next item.
